result.name: Templating In PHP With Twig
result.summary: A presentation I gave to devICT introducing the basics of the Twig templating language
result.description:
In November 2013 I gave a short presentation to devICT about the PHP templating enging Twig. The talk covered the basics of installing/configuring Twig, rendering templates, and writing templates.

The talk is 23 minutes long.
